mapper.insert: insert into rwd_record (rec_num, btitle, writer, rate, one_line, content) values (seq_rwd_record.nextval, #{btitle}, #{writer}, #{rate}, #{one_line}, #{content})
mapper.select: select * from rwd_record where rec_num > 0 order by rec_num desc

select rec_num, img, btitle, rate, one_line, content, regdate, update_date from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(rwd_record pk_rwd_record) */ rownum rn, rec_num, img, btitle, rate, one_line, content, regdate, update_date from rwd_record where writer = #{param2} and rownum <= (#{param1.page} * #{param1.amount}) ) where rn > ((#{param1.page} - 1) * #{param1.amount})
select count(*) from rwd_record where writer = #{email}
mapper.update: update rwd_record set rate = #{rate}, one_line = #{one_line}, content = #{content}, img = #{img}, update_date = sysdate where rec_num = #{rec_num}
